string.text:
Designed as a "soldier's weapon", special care was taken to produce a reliable, lightweight and inexpensive frontline-worthy rifle. Renowned for its high production quality and performance, the SG 550 is often referred to as the finest 5.56mm rifle ever made.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Switzerland
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Swiss Arms AG

A marksman variant of the popular SG 550 rifle, the 550-1 constitutes a perfect middle ground between a sniper and an assault rifle while retaining the strong points of both types of weaponry. Though it is somewhat lacking in stopping power and accuracy when compared to a dedicated sniper rifle, it retains the reliability and build quality of the SG 550.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Switzerland
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Swiss Arms AG

The most compact member of SIG's renowned SG 550 family, the SG 552 is specifically designed for urban combat and CQC situations. Like the SG 550, it is renowned for its high production quality and performance and is often still referred to as the finest 5.56mm rifle ever made.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Switzerland
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Swiss Arms AG
